projects.title: Autonomous Drone Navigation
projects.description: My final year project - built an AI system that teaches drones to navigate on their own using reinforcement learning. Works with real DJI Tello drones!

projects.title: Norðhús Website
projects.description: Built a complete website from scratch for a Faroese company. Full responsive design with PHP backend and dynamic content management.

links.ariaLabel: Visit Norðhús website (opens in new tab)

projects.title: Embedded Systems Suite
projects.description: Low-level C programming for Nordic microcontrollers. Built everything from GPIO control to real-time sensor data processing and displays.

projects.title: Distributed Auction System
projects.description: Secure online auction platform built with Java. Features encryption, user authentication, and fault-tolerant servers that keep running even if some crash.

projects.title: DNA Pattern Matcher
projects.description: Smart DNA analysis tool that converts genetic sequences into binary for faster pattern matching. Makes bioinformatics processing much more efficient.
